fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, judge a player's role. If their rile is aligned with a good faction, and the host feels as though the role should not have been made, then you will ❌ react them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players who are ❌ reacted cannot use any abilities or attributes until you die.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the good faction loses **OR** Kill role that gets pinged when the game starts (5010)

desc:
Post 5012
*why did you make this role...*
